snippet.title: Professor Lupo and his Horrible Pets (Narrative Trailer)
snippet.description:
Become the most epic Intern of all times! Escape the Aurora Space Station while its attackers haunt you and the aliens roam freely! Save your own skin, and perhaps even someone else's, or face a gruesome and brutal death!

Professor Lupo and his Horrible Pets is a fast paced puzzle adventure game, soon to be released on Steam and Nintendo Switch.

For more information visit: www.professorlupo.com

Will be available on Nintendo Switch and Steam.

For Steam - wishlist here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/741520/Professor_Lupo_and_his_Horrible_Pets/
